name: Brittney Guerriero
review: Sami is absolutely amazing. She brought my shy, timid, and fearful of life American Pit Bull Terrier out of her shell to the point where her personality is unrecognizable to ones who knew her prior! Whether you need basic training or some type of behavioral modification, Sami is your go to person!!

name: Diana Royalty
review: Sami is wonderful! She helped a lot with my Pitbull/Bully. She has a special place in her heart for pit/bully breeds. I am so grateful for her knowledge & grace throughout our journey. ðŸ’•

name: Katherine Dupler
review: Sami helped us so much with our puppy, Princess. Sami taught us how to train Princess and teach Princess new tricks. Sami made us feel confident that we can take our dog in public and that our dog will be well behaved.

name: Amanda Mackey
review: Sami has worked with my dog Kyle and has changed our life. We wouldn't have been able to keep our german shepherd dog if she hadn't intervened. Look forward to seeing her for our next lesson in a couple days.

name: Justine Davis
review: Sami is amazing dog trainer! She helped me get my dog to fly across the country. Sami was very good at accessing and understanding my needs and my dogs needs and making us ready to go anywhere in the world!

name: Sierra Henderson
review: Trained petunia for puppy class. Excellent work and kind to our baby. I would recommend her to everyone I know.
